data.message:
Hello Team, i am trying to change the name of our company fan page, >200 
Fans, but the button for the name change request do not show up in the 
information area. Our Facebook Name is 3M Zukunft Innovation, maybe 
someone can send me the link of the request form or look into the 
account and enable the button. Thanks and sorry for posting it again and again, but i really need an answer, because i would like to start with my ads before x-mas...

replies.message: Hi Lilian. You may not be able to change your Page's name for several reason. For example, if another admin has already submitted a request or the option isn't currently in your area. Learn more at: https://www.facebook.com/help/271607792873806  -Elissa
